subject: Re: [junit] A good way to end the day
msgSnippet: ... Kent Beck has this pattern too. He describes it in Test First Design . I don t have the book handy, but I think he called it Leave the last test broken .
messageBody:
> So my tip, end the day in fresh red.

Kent Beck has this pattern too. He describes it in "Test First Design". I
don't have the book handy, but I think he called it "Leave the last test
broken".
I applied it, and it works fine for me.

---------------
Paolo Perrotta
Bologna, Italy
